title: BlockBuster: A Humorous- Girl in Control Erotic Story
description: Some of the best written filth you will ever readLife has got Taylor down. She needs a pick me up or just to be picked up. Her ex is a jerk, her daughter doesn't understand her. She married too young and then got left. She thought she had the worst problems in town. Well she probably might, but then she meets another person who isn't having the best of luck. Could she turn both of their days around by letting him get lucky?
author: Cally Morehead
